column4: Is ubuntu FULL installation A LOT faster than wubi? or the difference isn't THAT much. I want a server
server? go real install, not wubi, wubi places an image inside your windows system... guess what could happen if your windows fuilesystem become damaged?
well, thing this way, databases create somehow their own filesystems running on top other filesystems, then you need to care enough about it
but you are going to install a server, you need reliability, NTFS is not a native fs for linux, so depend on it is...
